title: Pumpkin and ginger cheesecake
description: Turn leftover pumpkin pulp into a delicious dessert with these individual no-bake cheesecakes.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you can use four 7cm/3in chefs’ rings (about 6cm/2½in deep), but you can also make it in a 20cm/8in springform tin.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz pumpkin, peeled and cut into bite-sized pieces
3 tbsp ginger syrup (from a jar of stem ginger)
3 pieces stem ginger, finely chopped, plus extra for garnish
